content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including any photo tutorials + a bonus crochet stitch chart in one printable file without advertisements **stitch chart included** i ve always drooled over scheepjes whirl cakes i ve had this one sitting on a shelf staring at me for over a year until i was finally able to come up with the perfect design for it the yura wrap can be worn several ways depending on the occasion **adjustable length** the yura wrap is easily adjustable and includes instructions to do so i chose the length that i did so that it could easily be worn as a lightweight scarf **yardage** you ll need nearly an entire cake of whirl and 3/4 of a whirlette to complete your shawl as shown less or more if you decide to adjust the finished length **can i make this using only 1 cake of whirl ** yes you certainly can but the length of your wrap will be approximately 10 shorter than the one shown your wrap will also not end with the cream section as shown in the photos crochet wrap is a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2019 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/crochet-wrap/ 2 https //www facebook com/irickfrozenmoments/
